text: 2.5: Zo 13.15; 14.21-23; 15.4-5; 1 Pi 2.21; 1 Zo 4.12-13; 4.17; 5.3Guma the maaŋ muuŋgip Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ zɨn ŋgɨrga, mba guma, ana nza won Ndia Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira won ndavar kha nuianan ki gumgi ga nɨɨŋgiap, guigira mbe vuzvugi tɨva kaŋgi. Guma the mba tɨvar muunga, mba guma guigira Fhe Bakɨme phorga havhargi.
